name: Dark remote messages theme for iOS iMessages
description:
This is a dark theme for the Remote Messages iOS 9/8 jailbreak tweak.

Select the theme 'Seven' in the remote messages settings on your browser and refresh the page after applying this theme.
additional_info:
You may have to change the web address according to your network setup. This theme can cater for your device's IP changes on your network.

Apply the site to addresses beginning with:
http://10.0.0.

You need to alter this.

Because of the nature of this theme by default I had to set it to a global style. You must change this.
